synopsis.text: One of the most revered pirates in history, Woonan, amassed an unfathomable fortune in gold, amounting to a third of the world's supply. Tales of his hidden treasure on a secret island continue to captivate pirates and adventurers alike. Luffy and his Straw Hat Pirates find themselves on a quest to recover their stolen loot and uncover the truth behind Woonan's legendary treasure. Standing in their way is the ruthless El Drago, a fellow pirate who has also consumed a devil fruit and is hell-bent on claiming Woonan's riches. With the only map to the island in play, the race is on to see who will ultimately uncover the hidden gold and secure their place in pirate history.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
